alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otero and east central Dona Ana Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of McGregor Range Base, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McGregor Range Base. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 5 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
